(Attaching a Charm to a SIGNI is done by placing the Charm facedown under that SIGNI. A SIGNI can only have 1 Charm attached at a time. When a SIGNI with a Charm attached leaves the field, put its Charm into the trash.)

A SIGNI can only have 1 Charm attached at a time. When a SIGNI with a Charm attached leaves the field, put its Charm into the trash.)

card.name: Mayu, Genesis Miko
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this LRIG unless you reveal 1 Tama or Iona LRIG from your LRIG Deck and put it under your LRIG
[On-Play]: Put all LRIGs from your LRIG Trash under this card and return all white and black ARTS from your LRIG Trash to your LRIG deck. [Action] {Exceed 1}: All SIGNI on your opponent's field lose all their abilities until end of turn. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Put all cards from your Ener Zone into the trash and discard all cards in your hand. Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Hanayo Five
card.text:

[Constant]: This LRIG has the [Action] abilities of all LRIGs in your LRIG Trash. [Constant]: All SIGNI on your field get [Double Crush]. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Banish any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field whose total combined power is 30000 or lower.

card.name: Code Piruluk ACRO

[Constant]: This LRIG has the [Action] abilities of all LRIGs in your LRIG Trash. [On-Play]: Your opponent discards all cards in their hand. [Action] {Exceed 5}: If you have 6 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

card.name: Midoriko, Type Five
card.text:

[Constant]: This LRIG has the [Action] abilities of all LRIGs in your LRIG Trash. [On-Play]: Add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Each player puts all colored cards from their Ener Zone into the trash.

card.name: Tamayorihime, Sunspot Miko

[Constant]: All SIGNI in each players' zones except for their Ener Zones become black. [Action] {B}, Put 1 black card from your Ener Zone into the trash: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 5}: Down your opponent's LRIG and all SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Ulith, Enma of Nihilism

[Constant]: All cards in your Ener Zone get [Multi Ener]. [Constant]: Ignore the limiting conditions of all of your ARTS and SPELLs. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Choose 1 card from your hand. Your opponent declares 1 color, including colorless. Reveal your chosen card, and if that card's color does not match your opponent's declaration, put all SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Last Select

Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Put 4 cards from under your LRIG into the LRIG Trash. If you do, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Eldora=Mark V

Then look at all cards in your Life Cloth and rearrange them in any order. [Action] {Exceed 2}: Crush 1 card in your Life Cloth. If you do, add 1 card from your hand to your Life Cloth.

card.name: Milulun Tico

[Constant]: Your opponent cannot use SPELLs. [Action] {Exceed 1}: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the bottom of your deck in any order, then put the rest on top of your deck in any order. [Action] {Exceed 2}: You may use 1 SPELL from your opponent's trash without paying its cost, ignoring its limiting conditions.

card.name: Fortune Five

If you revealed 5, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Then, put all of the revealed cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

If you revealed 8 or more Beautiful Technique SIGNI with different names this way, return all SIGNI on your opponent's field to their owner's hand.

card.name: End Hole

If you paid {W}{R}{U}{G}{B} for this ARTS's cost, end the turn. (At the time the turn ends due to an effect or rules, put all cards in the Check Zones into the trash. If the turn player has more cards in their hand than their maximum hand size, they discard cards from their hand until the number of cards in their hand becomes equal to their maximum hand size. All "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

As you use this SPELL, you may down any number of upped Devil SIGNI on your field. This SPELL costs {B}{B} less to use for each SIGNI downed this way. Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. After that, put 1 Devil SIGNIfrom your trash onto your field, then add 1 Devil SIGNI from your trash to your Life Cloth.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.text: [Constant]: You cannot put this SIGNI from the field into the trash except by a card's effect. [Constant]: When 1 other SIGNI on your field is banished, you may banish this SIGNI. If you do put this SIGNI from your trash onto your field downed.

Discard any number of cards from your hand, then draw cards equal to the number of cards you discarded plus 1.

card.name: Servant Q3
card.text:
[Guard] (By discarding this card from your hand, disable 1 LRIG attack.) [Constant]: [Multi Ener] (If paying an ener cost, this card can pay for any 1 color of your choice.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Servant T3
card.text:
[Guard] (By discarding this card from your hand, disable 1 LRIG attack.) [Constant]: [Multi Ener] (If paying an ener cost, this card can pay for any 1 color of your choice.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Servant D3
card.text:
[Guard] (By discarding this card from your hand, disable 1 LRIG attack.) [Constant]: [Multi Ener] (If paying an ener cost, this card can pay for any 1 color of your choice.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Servant O3
card.text:
[Guard] (By discarding this card from your hand, disable 1 LRIG attack.) [Constant]: [Multi Ener] (If paying an ener cost, this card can pay for any 1 color of your choice.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Tamayorihime, Eternal Miko
card.text: [On-Play]: Search your deck for 1 Arm SIGNI and put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 2}: Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn.

card.name: Yuki, Pure White Miko
card.text: [Auto] [1/Turn]: When SIGNI on the field changes their SIGNI Zones by your card's effect, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: You may change the SIGNI Zone of any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 2}: Shuffle 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into its owner's deck.

card.name: Hanayo Four, Snow, Moon, Wind and Fire
card.text: [Action] {R}, Discard 1 red SIGNI from your hand: 1 red SIGNI on your field gets [Assassin] until end of turn. [Action] {R}, Discard 1 Ore or Gem SIGNI from your hand: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 2}: Draw 3 cards. At the beginning of your next attack phase, discard all cards in your hand.

card.name: Code Piruluk Lambda
card.text: [On-Play]: Draw 1 card, then your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Draw 2 cards. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 3}: Down and freeze 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. (A frozen SIGNI is not upped during its user's next up phase.)

card.name: Midoriko, Piercing Woman Type Four
card.text: [On-Play]: Add up to 3 cards from your Ener Zone to your hand. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. [Action] {Exceed 2}: All SIGNI on your field get [Lancer] until end of turn. (If a SIGNI with [Lancer] banishes an opponent's SIGNI by battle, it crushes 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.)

card.name: Ulith, Scorching Enma
card.text: [On-Play]: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into the trash. Then shuffle your deck. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Banish 1 Devil SIGNI. If you do, draw 2 cards. [Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: Discard 1 card from your hand. If you do, put 1 Devil SIGNI from your trash onto your field.

card.name: Tamayorihime, Meek Miko
card.text: [Constant]: When this LRIG is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, up 1 SIGNI on your field.

card.name: Yuki, Miko of Regret
card.text: [Constant]: When this LRIG is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, you may change the SIGNI Zone of any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Summon Labyrinth
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower white SIGNI and put it onto the field. Then shuffle your deck. If you have an Iona LRIG, search your deck for 1 level 4 or lower white SIGNI and put it onto your field instead. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Byzant Defense
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack unless you pay {3}." until end of turn. If have a Tama LRIG, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack unless you pay {4}." instead.

card.name: Eris, White Natural Star
card.type: RESONA - Nature Spirit: Space - Sashe Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Attack Phase]: Discard 2 Space SIGNI from your hand.
[Constant]: If this SIGNI is banished, it is put into the LRIG Trash instead of returning to the LRIG Deck. [On-Play]: 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack." until end of turn.

card.name: Hanayo Three, Pure Love Fire
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, 1 SIGNI on your field gets [Double Crush] until end of turn.

card.name: Absolute Extinction
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
This ARTS costs {R} less to use if you have a Hanayo LRIG. Discard all cards in your hand, then banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. If you discarded 3 or more cards from your hand this way, banish 1 more SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Code Piruluk Delta
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

card.name: Blue Punish
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
Choose up to two. If you have a Piruluk LRIG, choose up to three instead: - Cancel the effect of 1 SPELL with total cost 5 or less being used. - Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. - Draw 1 card.

card.name: Chain Blue and Black
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Chain] {U}{B} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {U}{B} less to use.) Choose up to two: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -3000 power until end of turn. - Add 1 non-colorless SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Look at your opponent's hand and the top card of your opponent's deck. - Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Midoriko, Sowing Girl Type Three
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.

card.name: Retribution
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
This ARTS costs {2} less to use multiplied by your LRIG's level. Put all white, red, blue, green, and black cards from your opponent's Ener Zone and all SIGNI on their field into the trash. If you have a Midoriko LRIG, put all cards from your opponent's Ener Zone and all SIGNI on their field into the trash instead.

card.name: Pluralism Depiction
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]:
[Chain] {G}{W} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {G}{W} less to use.) Choose one: - Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn. - If a card in your Life Cloth was crushed by your opponent's card effect this turn, add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. - Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI and put it onto your field. That SIGNI's [On-Play] ability is not triggered. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Ulith, Three Paths Enma
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, add 1 black SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Four Color Miasma
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose up to two. If you have a Ulith LRIG, choose up to three instead: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -12000 power until end of turn. - Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your trash onto your field. - Add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Each player puts the top 7 cards of their deck into the trash.

card.name: Refresh End
card.text:
Use Timing [Spell Cut-In]
When your opponent refreshes their deck this turn, end the turn. (At the time the turn ends due to an effect or rules, put all cards in the Check Zones into the trash. If the turn player has more cards in their hand than their maximum hand size, they discard cards from their hand until the number of cards in their hand becomes equal to their maximum hand size. All "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: Code Labyrinth Pishato
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When this SIGNI leaves the field during your opponent's turn, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, search your deck for 1 Labyrinth SIGNI and put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. [Constant]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks, you may down this upped SIGNI. If you do, you may change the SIGNI Zones of any number of SIGNI on your field.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 Labyrinth SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck, then down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Hestia, Altar of Sacred Fire
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Angel - Tama Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When a card in your Life Cloth is crushed, you may put this SIGNI from your trash onto your field. [On-Play]: If you have 1 or less cards in your Life Cloth, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put up to 2 Angel SIGNI from among them onto your field, then put the rest on top of your deck in any order.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 Angel SIGNI, reveal it, then either add it to your hand or put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Goldaura, Natural Pyroxene
card.type: SIGNI - Nature Spirit: Gem - Hanayo Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: All SIGNI on your field are unaffected by your opponent's [Life Burst] effects. [Constant]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field is banished during your main phase, 1 SIGNI on your field gets [Double Crush] until end of turn. [On-Play]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Ore or Gem SIGNI, add it to your hand.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 Ore SIGNI and 1 Gem SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Goldgun, Ballista
card.text: [Constant]: When a Weapon SIGNI on your field crushes 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth, draw 1 card. [On-Play]: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into the trash. Then if there are 2 or more SIGNI with the same level among the cards put into the trash this way, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Code Heart MPP
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text:
[On-Play]: Put up to 3 SPELLs from your trash under this SIGNI. [Constant]: When 1 SIGNI on your field would be banished, you may put 2 SPELLs from under this SIGNI into the trash instead. [Action] [Spell Cut-In] Put 1 SPELL from under this SIGNI into the trash: Cancel the effect of 1 SPELL being used.
[Life Burst]: Discard any number of SPELLs from your hand. Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field for each SPELL discarded this way.

card.name: Gurehozame, Water Phantom Princess
card.text: [Auto]: When you or your opponent triggers a card's [Life Burst] ability, draw 1 card. [Auto] [1/Turn]: When you draw 1 or more cards during the attack phase, up or down a number of SIGNI on the field up to the number of cards you drew during this turn's attack phase.

card.name: Ultim, Phantom Beast Deity
card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Earth Beast - Midoriko Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When this SIGNI banishes a SIGNI on your opponent's field, if your Sky Beast or Earth Beast SIGNI banished a total of 3 SIGNI from your opponent's field this turn, up this SIGNI.
[Life Burst]: The SIGNI on your center SIGNI Zone gets +5000 power and gains [Lancer] during the next turn.

card.name: Snorop, Natural Plant Princess
card.text:
[Constant]: This SIGNI gets all colors among the cards in your Ener Zone in addition to its other colors. [Constant]: This SIGNI gets +4000 power for each of its colors and is unaffected by the effects of your opponent's SIGNI that share a color with it. [Constant]: At the end of your opponent's turn, if this SIGNI has 20000 power and if you have 2 or less cards in your Life Cloth, add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth.
[Life Burst]: Put up to 2 cards from your trash into your Ener Zone.

card.name: Diabolos, Mortality of the Weak
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Devil - Ulith Limited
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, banish 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field. [On-Play]: Discard 2 cards from your hand. [Action] {B}: Reduce the level of 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field by 1. (Its level cannot be 0 or less.)
[Life Burst]: Banish any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field with a total combined level of 3 or lower.

card.name: Nanahoshi, Great Phantom Insect
card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Misfortune Insect - Myuu Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: While there is a Charm on your opponent's field, this SIGNI cannot be banished. [Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase]: 1 SIGNI on the field gets -3000 power for each Charm on the field until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: You may attach the top card of your opponent's deck as to 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field as a Charm. Then all SIGNI on your opponent's field with a Charm attached gets -8000 power until end of turn.

card.name: Mjolnir, Ultimate Hammer
card.text: [Constant]: When an Arm SIGNI leaves your field, you may put 1 SIGNI with a lower level than that SIGNI from your hand onto your field.

card.name: Code Maze Gojuu
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While this SIGNI is upped during your opponent's turn, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. [Constant]: When this SIGNI on your field changes its SIGNI Zone by a card effect, you may pay {W}. If you do, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Clotho, Left Thread of Fate
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Angel - Tama Limited
card.text:
(Cross): "Lachesis, Right Thread of Fate" Left
[On-Play]: Declare 1 card name, then reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the declared card name from among them to your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. [Cross Constant]: When this SIGNI reaches [Heaven], you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, add 1 white ARTS from your LRIG Trash to your LRIG Deck.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Code Maze Kinkaku
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text:
(Cross): "Code Maze Ginkaku" Right
[Constant]: At the end of your turn, up all Labyrinth SIGNI on your field. [Cross Constant]: When this SIGNI reaches [Heaven], all SIGNI on your opponent's field lose their abilities and cannot get abilities during the next main phase.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Labyrinth Romance
card.text:
This SPELL costs {W} less to use for each Labyrinth SIGNI on your field. Shuffle all SIGNI on your opponent's field into their owner's deck, then your opponent puts up to 3 SIGNI from their hand onto their field.
[Life Burst]: Shuffle 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into its owner's deck.

card.name: Kung Fu Kick
card.text: Search your deck for up to 2 white SIGNI and put them onto your field. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Auroaura, Natural Stone
card.type: SIGNI - Nature Spirit: Gem - Hanayo Limited
card.text:
(Cross): "Roseaura, Natural Stone" Left
[On-Play]: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into the trash. If 2 Ore or Gem SIGNI were put into the trash this way, draw 1 card. [Cross Constant]: When this SIGNI reaches Heaven, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power lower than or equal to the number of Ore and Gem SIGNI in your trash multiplied by 1000.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Western Gunshot
card.text:
Damage your opponent. (If your opponent has 1 or more cards in their Life Cloth, crush 1 card in their Life Cloth. If they have 0 cards in their Life Cloth, you win the game.)
[Life Burst]: You may pay {R}{R}. If you do, crush 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.

card.name: Code Art MKE
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text:
(Cross): "Code Art CMC" Right
[On-Play]: Search your deck for 1 SPELL with total cost 4 or more, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. [Cross Constant]: Once per turn, when this SIGNI reaches [Heaven], you may use 1 blue SPELL from your hand. It costs {U}{U} less to use by this effect.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: SHOOTING
card.text:
As you use this SPELL, you may discard 3 SPELLs from your hand. If you do, this SPELL costs {U}{U}{U} to use. Your opponent discards 3 cards from their hand.
[Life Burst]: Your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand unless they discard 1 colorless card.

card.name: Takoage, Fourth Play
card.type: SIGNI - War Spirit: Playground Equipment - Aiyai Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When this SIGNI is put onto your field by a card effect, up 1 SIGNI on your field. [Constant]: When this SIGNI is banished by a card effect, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Add up to 2 SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Actilf, Phantom Beast
card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Earth Beast - Midoriko Limited
card.text:
(Cross): "Actics, Phantom Beast" Left
[On-Play]: 1 Sky Beast or Earth Beast SIGNI on your field gets +5000 power until end of turn. [Cross Constant]: When this SIGNI reaches Heaven, banish 1 SIGNI on your field. Then banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power equal to or lower than that SIGNI.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Adventure
card.text: Search your deck for 5 cards and put them into your Ener Zone. The shuffle your deck.

card.name: 666, the Cursed Number
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Devil - Ulith Limited
card.text: [On-Play]: Your SIGNI's [On-Play] abilities do not trigger for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Kiiroten, Phantom Insect
card.text: [On-Play]: Put all Charms on your opponent's field into the trash. [Action] [Attack Phase]: Put this SIGNI from your trash onto your field. Use this ability only if there are 3 Charms on your opponent's field.

card.name: Alecto, Right Devil of Vengeance
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Devil - Ulith Limited
card.text:
(Cross): "Tisiphone, Left Devil of Vengeance" Right
[On-Play]: Reduce the level of 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field by 1. (Its level cannot be less than 0.) [Cross Constant]: When this SIGNI reaches [Heaven], banish all level 1 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Level Down
card.text:
Banish 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field, then 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field becomes level 1 until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Add 1 Devil SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - All SIGNI on your opponent's field and SIGNI that are put onto your opponent's field become level 1 during the next turn.

card.name: Servant Z
card.text: [Constant]: [Multi Ener] [On-Play] {3}: Search your deck for 1 "Servant X" and 1 "Servant Y" and put them onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. [Action] Put 8 Origin Spirit SIGNI with different names from your Ener Zone into your trash: Exclude all cards in your opponent's hand and Ener Zone from the game.

card.text: [Constant]: While there is a SIGNI with no abilities on your opponent's field, this SIGNI's power becomes 12000 and gets "When this SIGNI attacks, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 3000 power or lower to its owner's hand."

card.name: Aikuro, Large Claw
card.text: [Constant]: Once per turn, when an Arm SIGNI is put onto your field by a card effect (including this one), draw 1 card.

card.text: [On-Play]: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field loses all abilities and cannot get abilities until end of turn.

[Cross Constant]: This SIGNI's power becomes 5000. [Cross On-Play]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 3000 power or lower.

card.text: [Action] [Attack Phase] Put this SIGNI into the trash: Draw 2 cards. (An ability with a Use Timing can only be used during that timing.)

The [On-Play] abilities of those SIGNI do not trigger. - Exclude up to 3 cards in your opponent's trash from the game. - Shuffle 3 cards from your trash into your deck, then draw 1 card.

card.text:

[Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 Coin as you use this ARTS.) Choose one. If you bet, choose up to three instead: - If a SIGNI left your field by your opponent's card effect this turn, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - If a card was put from your Ener Zone into the trash by your opponent's card effect this turn, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone. - If you discarded a card from your hand by your opponent's card effect this turn, if you have 5 or less cards in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand.
